title: AJ Gordon (Petersen Museum)
description: This Week AJ Gordon of the Peterson Automotive Museum and the Car Stories podcast joins us in studio. We talk about the rennovation of the Peterson museum, gauche behavior at car shows, how jaded automotive media is, Ford GT pricing and whether or not the Hennessey Vemom GT is usable as a canyon carver.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
